ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night vision audio video CMOS security camera
30 IR illuminators for night vision. 6.0mm Lens. Built-in microphone for audio
Free adjustable camera swivel mount for easy installation. 380TVL
Built-in light sensor controls IR activation. Metal body housing, mount and sun shade
Package included: 2 of bullet cameras, 2 of brackets and 2 of security warning decals. Power requirement: 12V DC 500mA or above (sold separately)
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 of Audio Video Bullet Security Cameras Outdoor Indoor Built-in Microphone IR Infrared Day Night for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System with Bonus Warning Stickers CKG
